message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.CL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the design of an information retrieval system that uses ontology-based annotation to assess the relevance of documents. This falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also mentions the use of machine learning models to aggregate the annotations, which suggests a connection to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The use of ontology also implies a connection to Database (cs.DB) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a semantic map to display the selection of documents, which could be related to Visualization (cs.LG).
